code: public static PGConnection toPGConnection(Connection connection) throws SQLException {     if (connection == null) {         throw new IllegalArgumentException("Connection must not be null").     }     PGConnection conn.     if (connection instanceof PGConnection) {         conn = (PGConnection) connection.     } else if (connection.isWrapperFor(PGConnection.class)) {         conn = connection.unwrap(PGConnection.class).     } else {         throw new IllegalStateException("Cannot obtain PGConnection").     }     return conn. }
